description: This file defines the OpenWeatherTools class, a toolkit for accessing various weather-related data from the OpenWeatherMap API, including current weather, forecast, air pollution, and geocoding functionalities.

classes.name: OpenWeatherTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with OpenWeatherMap API, providing methods for geocoding, current weather, forecast, and air pollution data retrieval.

methods.name: _make_request
methods.description: Makes an HTTP GET request to the specified URL with given parameters and returns the JSON response or error.

methods.name: geocode_location
methods.description: Converts a location name into geographic coordinates using the OpenWeatherMap geocoding API.

methods.name: get_current_weather
methods.description: Retrieves current weather data for a specified location by geocoding the location and then querying the weather API.

methods.name: get_forecast
methods.description: Retrieves weather forecast data for a specified location, limited to a maximum of 5 days.

methods.name: get_air_pollution
methods.description: Retrieves current air pollution data for a specified location.
